verbose_text: Previously, it has also been shown that GRHL2 enhances skin-barrier function by upregulating the tight-junction components claudins 3 and 4 and also Rab25, which localizes claudin 4 to tight junctions.
evidence: GRHL2 enhances skin-barrier function by upregulating the tight-junction components claudins 3 and 4 and also Rab25
